text: [Music]
hey guys welcome to in the kitchen with
sarah jansen i am your host sarah in
case you missed last week's show let me
catch you up to speed after a
disagreement at a farmer's market over
the last jar of honey a witch cast a
spell on me and turned me into a dog
nevertheless i'm not going to let the
fact that i am a dog stop me so in honor
of halloween today we are going to be
doing one of my favorite recipes pumpkin
chocolate chip banana muffins it's gonna
be
spooktacular let's get started first
things first you're gonna want to peel
two bananas and mash them up in a bowl
until smooth
here's where being a dog starts to
become a real nuisance for me you know
what we're just gonna throw that whole
banana in there
now you're gonna want to mash those bad
boys up really well
can't hold a tool because you don't have
thumbs feel free to just use your paws
then you're gonna go ahead and pour a
half a cup of melted butter onto the
bananas i cannot reach the microwave to
melt the butter so i'm just gonna squish
it up real good right here
some people have written me on social
media and said sarah what's the worst
thing about being a dog it's gotta be
that my own husband didn't recognize me
and took me to an animal shelter but
luckily a nice woman named linda adopted
me
oh there you go and then we add our two
eggs since i don't have hands i'm just
gonna try and fight them really quick
okay well that went poorly just gonna
push that onto my paws and
try to scrape it in there and then i'm
gonna taste the raw eggs while i'm at it
now's the time i would normally add the
chocolate chips but chocolate is
actually poisonous to dogs so instead
i'm going to be substituting some
leftover kibble i've been holding in my
mouth since breakfast
[Music]
okay give that all a good mix
this is this is just a real mess here i
don't even know why i try
oh man linda's gonna freak when she sees
her kitchen i gotta go hide under the
dining room table but tune in next week
and remember what i always say stay away
from witches at the farmer's market or
they might turn you into a dog
till next time sarah out of the kitchen
bad dog
are you ready for a halloween house
party
get ready for the halloween house party
